column5: Start Date: SeptemberHealthcare is a subject area that affects everyone from all over the world, and this MSc International Healthcare Management programme gives you a chance to delve into the worldwide management of this complex and vital field. MSc International Healthcare Management OverviewDuring this online MSc International Healthcare Management course you will look into healthcare management issues facing managers today. You’ll learn how to make decisions and implement change based on those issues, as well as issues you are facing in your own healthcare environment.
